pages.text: The $(item)Taglock$() is yet another essential tool.$(br)It can gather an entity's hair, blood, and all things needed to establish a $(marked)connection$().$(br)To gather a Taglock from an entity, either sneak up from behind or search for their $(item)Bed$().$(br2)$(o)To gather a Taglock from a Bed, use the Taglock while sneaking so you don't accidentally sleep$().
Recipes that require a Taglock will usually assume that this Taglock has already been bound.
